note: Retired Earth Science teacher BBall and Soccer coach, and union activist, representative. Now loving life as a granddad, flyfisher/tyer and lousy golfer.  Enjoy reading good science, science fiction and good writing in general (a soft spot for Patrick F. McManus, Christopher Moore and Stephen Leacock).  Music lover of wide-range of artists from Beefheart to Brubeck. Enough about moi. How are you?
